page.title: 10LOCAL FESTIVAL
page.content: THREE-IN-ONE FESTIVAL Three fellside parishes are joining forces this year (1985) for a big three-day festival starting on Friday June 21.Bolton,Ireby and Uldale are now a Church of England United benefice. So Bolton is putting on a crafts display,Ireby a local history and costume exhibition avd Uldale a flower festival. The Vicar of all the parishes, the Rev David King, said that by taking advantage of modern-day unity it was possible to sponsor a weekend of united festival. The festival is called the "three-in-one". Local arts and crafts, flowers and old-time costumes will be supported by a Carlisle Male Voice Choir plus concerts by children from the three parishes.
